TLN01.SQL:
select distinct lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||'-'||ltrim(to_char(lagi.lagi_mawb_no, '00000000')) as AWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_expected as Pieces_Bill, lagi.lagi_weight_expected as Weight_Bill, x.PIECES as PIECES_FFM,x.WEIGHT as WEIGHT_FFM, (select sum(lagi2.lagi_quantity_expected) from lagi lagi2 where lagi2.lagi_master_ident_no = lagi.lagi_ident_no group by lagi2.lagi_master_ident_no) as Pieces_Hawb, (select sum(lagi2.lagi_weight_expected) from lagi lagi2 where lagi2.lagi_master_ident_no = lagi.lagi_ident_no group by lagi2.lagi_master_ident_no) as Weight_Hawb, lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT as NATURE, awbu.awbu_specialhandlingcodes as SHC, lagi.lagi_shipment_remarks as REMARK,
0 as CheckCondtion, lagi.lagi_master_ident_no as ID
-- sond.sond_special_goods as SHC FROM flui flui JOIN PALO palo on palo.palo_lvg_in = flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code and palo.palo_flight_no_in = flui.flui_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + palo.palo_flight_arrival_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = palo.palo_uld_isn and awbu.awbu_uld_serial = palo.palo_serial_no_ and awbu.awbu_uld_no = palo.palo_type and awbu.awbu_uld_owner = palo.palo_owner and awbu.awbu_object_type = 'IMPORT AWB' JOIN LAGI lagi on awbu.awbu_mawb_prefix = lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix and awbu.awbu_mawb_serial_no = lagi.lagi_mawb_no left join (select t.awbu_mawb_ident_no as ID, sum (t.awbu_pieces_origin) as PIECES,sum( t.awbu_weight_origin) as WEIGHT from (select distinct awbu.* FROM flui flui JOIN PALO palo on palo.palo_lvg_in = flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code and palo.palo_flight_no_in = flui.flui_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' , 'DD-MM-YYYY') +flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('02-01-0001', 'DD-MM-YYYY') + palo.palo_flight_arrival_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = palo.palo_uld_isn and awbu.awbu_uld_serial = palo.palo_serial_no_ and awbu.awbu_uld_no = palo.palo_type and awbu.awbu_uld_owner = palo.palo_owner and awbu.awbu_object_type = 'IMPORT AWB' JOIN LAGI lagi on awbu.awbu_mawb_prefix = lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix and awbu.awbu_mawb_serial_no = lagi.lagi_mawb_no -- and to_date('02-01-0001' , 'DD-MM-YYYY') +lagi.lagi_flight_date_in = awbu.awbu_flight_date WHERE 1 = 1 AND to_date('02-01-0001' , 'DD-MM-YYYY') +flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no = '{1}' )t group by t.awbu_mawb_ident_no )x on x.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- and lagi.lagi_master_ident_no = 0
-- and lagi.lagi_flight_no_in = awbu.awbu_flight_no -- and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + lagi.lagi_flight_date_in = awbu.awbu_flight_date -- JOIN SOND sond on sond.sond_prefix = lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix and sond.sond_serial_no = lagi.lagi_mawb_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 --AND awbu.awbu_mawb_prefix not like '%Z%' AND to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') AND flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no = '{1}' order by 1,4
TLN01.DES: DANH SÁCH HÀNG DỰ KIẾN VỀ TRÊN CHUYẾN BAY

TLN02.SQL:
select x.FLIGHT_NO as FLIGHT_NO, x.MAWB as MAWB, z.HAWB, x.pieces_received as "SỐ KIỆN", x.weight_received as "TRỌNG LƯỢNG", y.pieces_received as "SỐ KIỆN BƯU ĐIỆN", y.weight_received as "TRỌNG LƯỢNG BƯU ĐIỆN", (x.pieces_received + NVL(y.pieces_received, 0) ) as "TỔNG KIỆN", (x.weight_received + NVL(y.weight_received, 0)) as "TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG", (x.MAWB + z. HAWB) as "TỔNG LÔ HÀNG" from (select m.FLIGHT_NO, count(distinct(m.MAWB))as MAWB, sum(m.pieces_received) as pieces_received, sum(m.weight_received) as weight_received
from ( select distinct flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no FLIGHT_NO, to_char(to_date(flui.flui_landed_time,'HH24MISS'),'HH24:MI:SS') as ATA_TIME, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.lagi_hawb as HAWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_received as pieces, lagi.lagi_weight_received as weight, j.* --grli.grli_shc as shc --max(grli.grli_shc) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grli.grli_shc desc) as shc, --row_number() over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grai.grai_object_group_isn) as rn from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as weight_received from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces_received from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%MAIL%' and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%POST%' ) m --where rn=1 group by m.FLIGHT_NO )x left join ( select m.FLIGHT_NO, count(distinct(m.MAWB))as MAWB, --SUM(NVL2(LENGTH(TRIM(m.HAWB)),1,0)) as HAWB, COUNT(DISTINCT m.HAWB) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN m.HAWB = ' ' THEN 0 END) as HAWB, sum(m.pieces_received) as pieces_received, sum(m.weight_received) as weight_received
from ( select distinct flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no FLIGHT_NO, to_char(to_date(flui.flui_landed_time,'HH24MISS'),'HH24:MI:SS') as ATA_TIME, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.lagi_hawb as HAWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_received as pieces, lagi.lagi_weight_received as weight, j.*, --grli.grli_shc as shc --max(grli.grli_shc) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grli.grli_shc desc) as shc, row_number() over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grai.grai_object_group_isn) as rn from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as weight_received from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces_received from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and (lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT LIKE '%MAIL%' or lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT LIKE '%POST%') ) m where rn=1 group by m.FLIGHT_NO )y on x.FLIGHT_NO = y.FLIGHT_NO join ( SELECT flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code||flui.flui_flight_no AS FLIGHT_NO, count(distinct lagi.LAGI_HAWB) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lagi.LAGI_HAWB = ' ' THEN 1 END) as HAWB FROM flui flui JOIN PALO palo on palo.palo_lvg_in = flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code and palo.palo_flight_no_in = flui.flui_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + palo.palo_flight_arrival_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = palo.palo_uld_isn and awbu.awbu_uld_serial = palo.palo_serial_no_ and awbu.awbu_uld_no = palo.palo_type and awbu.awbu_uld_owner = palo.palo_owner and awbu.awbu_object_type = 'IMPORT AWB' JOIN LAGI lagi on awbu.awbu_mawb_prefix = lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix and awbu.awbu_mawb_serial_no = lagi.lagi_mawb_no and lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) -- and lagi.lagi_flight_no_in = awbu.awbu_flight_no -- and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + lagi.lagi_flight_date_in = awbu.awbu_flight_date WHERE 1 = 1 AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 AND to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') group by flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code,flui.flui_flight_no )z on x.FLIGHT_NO = z.FLIGHT_NO
TLN02.COLUMN: FLIGHT_NO,MAWB,HAWB,SỐ KIỆN,TRỌNG LƯỢNG,SỐ KIỆN BƯU ĐIỆN,TRỌNG LƯỢNG BƯU ĐIỆN,TỔNG KIỆN,TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG,TỔNG LÔ HÀNG
TLN02.DES: BÁO CÁO SẢN LƯỢNG CHUYẾN BAY THEO NGÀY

TLN03.SQL:
select k.ATA_DATE as "NGÀY", sum(k.pieces) as "TỔNG KIỆN", sum(k.weight) as "TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG", sum(k.pieces_mail) as "TỔNG KIỆN MAIL", sum(k.weight_mail) as "TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG MAIL", sum(k.pieces) + NVL(sum(k.pieces_mail), 0) AS TOTALPICES, sum(k.weight) + NVL(sum(k.weight_mail),0) AS TOTALWEIGHT, sum(k.totalAwb) as "TỔNG SỐ LÔ HÀNG" from ( select x.ATA_DATE, x.pieces_received as pieces, x.weight_received as weight, y.pieces_received as pieces_mail, y.weight_received as weight_mail, (x.MAWB + z.HAWB) as totalAwb from (select m.FLIGHT_NO, m.ATA_DATE, count(distinct(m.MAWB))as MAWB, --SUM(NVL2(LENGTH(TRIM(m.HAWB)),1,0)) as HAWB, COUNT(DISTINCT m.HAWB) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN m.HAWB = ' ' THEN 0 END) as HAWB, sum(m.pieces_received) as pieces_received, sum(m.weight_received) as weight_received
from ( select distinct flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no FLIGHT_NO, to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS ATA_DATE, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.lagi_hawb as HAWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_received as pieces, lagi.lagi_weight_received as weight, j.* --grli.grli_shc as shc --max(grli.grli_shc) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grli.grli_shc desc) as shc, --row_number() over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grai.grai_object_group_isn) as rn from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as weight_received from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces_received from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date between to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('{1}','dd/mm/yyyy') and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%MAIL%' and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%POST%' ) m --where rn=1 group by m.FLIGHT_NO,m.ATA_DATE )x left join ( select m.FLIGHT_NO, m.ATA_DATE, count(distinct(m.MAWB))as MAWB, --SUM(NVL2(LENGTH(TRIM(m.HAWB)),1,0)) as HAWB, COUNT(DISTINCT m.HAWB) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN m.HAWB = ' ' THEN 0 END) as HAWB, sum(m.pieces_received) as pieces_received, sum(m.weight_received) as weight_received
from ( select distinct flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no FLIGHT_NO, to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS ATA_DATE, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.lagi_hawb as HAWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_received as pieces, lagi.lagi_weight_received as weight, j.* --grli.grli_shc as shc --max(grli.grli_shc) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grli.grli_shc desc) as shc, --row_number() over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grai.grai_object_group_isn) as rn from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as weight_received from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces_received from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date between to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('{1}','dd/mm/yyyy') and (lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT LIKE '%MAIL%' or lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT LIKE '%POST%') ) m --where rn=1 group by m.FLIGHT_NO,m.ATA_DATE )y on x.FLIGHT_NO = y.FLIGHT_NO and x.ATA_DATE = y.ATA_DATE join ( SELECT flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code||flui.flui_flight_no AS FLIGHT_NO, to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS ATA_DATE, count(distinct lagi.LAGI_HAWB) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lagi.LAGI_HAWB = ' ' THEN 1 END) as HAWB FROM flui flui JOIN PALO palo on palo.palo_lvg_in = flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code and palo.palo_flight_no_in = flui.flui_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_schedule_date = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + palo.palo_flight_arrival_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = palo.palo_uld_isn and awbu.awbu_uld_serial = palo.palo_serial_no_ and awbu.awbu_uld_no = palo.palo_type and awbu.awbu_uld_owner = palo.palo_owner and awbu.awbu_object_type = 'IMPORT AWB' JOIN LAGI lagi on awbu.awbu_mawb_prefix = lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix and awbu.awbu_mawb_serial_no = lagi.lagi_mawb_no and lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) -- and lagi.lagi_flight_no_in = awbu.awbu_flight_no -- and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + lagi.lagi_flight_date_in = awbu.awbu_flight_date WHERE 1 = 1 AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date between to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('{1}','dd/mm/yyyy') group by flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code,flui.flui_flight_no,flui.flui_landed_date )z on x.FLIGHT_NO = z.FLIGHT_NO and x.ATA_DATE = z.ATA_DATE )k group by k.ATA_DATE order by k.ATA_DATE asc
TLN03.COLUMN: NGÀY,TỔNG KIỆN,TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG,TỔNG KIỆN MAIL,TỔNG TRỌNG LƯỢNG MAIL,TOTALPICES,TOTALWEIGHT,TỔNG SỐ LÔ HÀNG
TLN03.DES: BÁO CÁO TỔNG HỢP SẢN LƯỢNG

TLN04.SQL:
select distinct lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.lagi_hawb as HAWB_NO, lagi.lagi_quantity_expected as PIECES_FWB_FHL, lagi.lagi_weight_expected as WEIGTH_FWB_FHL, sum(j.pieces_received) as PIECES, sum(j.weight_received) as WEIGTH, 0 as "TÌNH TRẠNG", lagi.lagi_goods_content as "TÊN HÀNG", (select case when l.lagi_quantity_received < l.lagi_quantity_expected then 0 else 1 end as Check_Receive from lagi l where l.lagi_ident_no = lagi.lagi_ident_no) as CHECK_RECEIVE, (select count(grai_object_isn) from grai_group_additional_info where grai_object_isn = lagi.lagi_ident_no and grai_group_type = 'DATE' and grai_group_code = 'DELIVERED') as STATUS_DELIVERED ,
(select count(ccf.cusf_form_number) from lagi l --inner join agen a on l.lagi_ident_no = a.agen_ident_no inner join cusf_customs_forms ccf on ccf.cusf_ident_no = l.lagi_ident_no where l.lagi_ident_no = lagi.lagi_ident_no --and a.agen_status_external = 'DOCUMENT WERE HANDED OUT TO' ) as STATUS_PXK, lagi.LAGI_SHIPPER_NAME as "NGƯỜI GỬI", lagi.LAGI_CONSIGNEE_NAME as "NGƯỜI NHẬN", lagi.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS as REMARK from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as weight_received from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces_received from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no = '{1}' -- and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%MAIL%' -- and lagi.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT NOT LIKE '%POST%' group by lagi.lagi_ident_no,lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no, lagi.lagi_hawb,lagi.lagi_quantity_expected, lagi.lagi_weight_expected,lagi.LAGI_SHIPPER_NAME,lagi.LAGI_CONSIGNEE_NAME, lagi.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS,lagi.lagi_goods_content order by 1
TLN04.DES: DANH SÁCH HÀNG VỀ TRÊN CHUYẾN BAY

TLN05.SQL:
select * from (select distinct lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix||lagi.lagi_mawb_no as MAWB, lagi.LAGI_HAWB as HAWB, lagi.lagi_quantity_received as PIECES, lagi.lagi_weight_received as WEIGHT, sslp.sslp_rack_row as LOCATION, j.*, --grli.grli_shc as shc max(locs.locs_physical_isn) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by locs.locs_physical_isn desc) as sequence_no, --max(grli.grli_shc) over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grli.grli_shc desc) as shc, row_number() over (partition by grai.grai_object_group_isn order by grai.grai_object_group_isn desc) as rn from ( select k.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as WEIGHT_RECEIVED from ( select i.*, grai.grai_numeric_value as PIECES_RECEIVED from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, grai.grai_value as SHC from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai
where grai.grai_group_type='SHC' and grai.grai_group_code='STORAGE' )i join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on i.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and i.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' )j join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on j.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and j.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='FLIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='ISN' join han_w1_hl.flui flui on grai.grai_value = flui.flui_internal_number join han_w1_hl.lagi lagi on j.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no -- JOIN han_w1_hl.grli_group_location_info grli on j.ID = grli.grli_object_isn -- join agen agen on agen.agen_ident_no = lagi.lagi_ident_no
join locs_locations locs on lagi.lagi_ident_no = locs.locs_object_isn join han_w1_hl.sslp_physical_locations sslp on locs.locs_physical_isn = sslp.sslp_physical_isn where to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flui.flui_landed_date = to_date('{0}','dd/mm/yyyy') and flui.flui_al_2_3_letter_code || flui.flui_flight_no = '{1}' -- and grai.grai_object_group_isn = '10022001063019' -- order by locs.locs_last_updated
) m where rn=1 order by 1
TLN05.DES: DANH SÁCH HÀNG ĐẶC BIỆT TRÊN CHUYẾN BAY

TLN06.SQL: SELECT T.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT TEN_HANG ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_RECEIVED SO_LUONG ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_RECEIVED TRONG_LUONG ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Name NGUOI_GUI ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Address DIA_CHI_GUI ,t.lagi_consignee_name NGUOI_NHAN ,t.lagi_consignee_address DIA_CHI_NHAN ,T.LAGI_MAWB_PREFIX || TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_MAWB_NO ,'00000000') MAWB ,T.LAGI_HAWB HAWB ,K.KUND_3_LETTER_CODE || ' ' || T.LAGI_FLIGHT_NO_IN FLIGHT_NO , TO_CHAR(GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0),'DD/MM/YYYY') FLIGHT_DATE ,'ALSC' VI_TRI_DIA_DIEM ,'' PHAN_LOAI ,T.LAGI_AWB_ORIGIN ORIGIN ,apcc.apcc_airport_name GOODS_ORIGIN ,T.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS GHI_CHU ,LISTAGG(L.SSLP_RACK_ROW||'-'||L.SSLP_RACK_LOCATION||'-'||L.SSLP_RACK_HEIGHT, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY L.LOCS_PHYSICAL_ISN) VI_TRI FROM LAGI T ,KUND K ,LCNV_LOCATIONS_VIEW L ,vn_share_hl.apcc apcc WHERE T.LAGI_CUSTOMER_NO_AIRLINE = K.KUND_CUSTOMER_NO_ AND L.IDENT_NO = T.LAGI_IDENT_NO AND L.LOCS_DELETED = 0 --AND T.LAGI_DELETED = 0 AND K.KUND_RECORD_DELETED = 0 AND apcc.apcc_airport_code = T.LAGI_AWB_ORIGIN /*AND (T.LAGI_DATE_LATEST_PKG_DEL IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_DATE_LATEST_PKG_DEL) = ' ')*/ AND T.Lagi_Date_First_Pkg_Rec <= trunc(sysdate) - {0} AND T.Lagi_Date_First_Pkg_Rec > trunc(sysdate) - {1} AND (T.lagi_tso is null or T.lagi_tso not in ('ALSW','ALST','ALSB','ALSE','CLC')) --AND T.LAGI_MAWB_NO = '23314362' GROUP BY T.LAGI_MAWB_PREFIX || TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_MAWB_NO ,'00000000') ,T.LAGI_HAWB ,K.KUND_3_LETTER_CODE || ' ' || T.LAGI_FLIGHT_NO_IN ,GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0) ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_EXPECTED ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_EXPECTED ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_RECEIVED ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_RECEIVED ,T.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS ,T.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Name ,T.Lagi_Consignee_Name ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Address ,t.lagi_consignee_address ,T.LAGI_AWB_ORIGIN ,apcc.apcc_airport_name ORDER BY GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0) desc

TLN07.SQL: SELECT T.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT TEN_HANG ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_RECEIVED SO_LUONG ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_RECEIVED TRONG_LUONG ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Name NGUOI_GUI ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Address DIA_CHI ,t.lagi_consignee_name NGUOI_NHAN ,t.lagi_consignee_address DIA_CHI ,T.LAGI_MAWB_PREFIX || TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_MAWB_NO ,'00000000') MAWB ,T.LAGI_HAWB HAWB ,K.KUND_3_LETTER_CODE || ' ' || T.LAGI_FLIGHT_NO_IN FLIGHT_NO , TO_CHAR(GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0),'DD/MM/YYYY') FLIGHT_DATE ,'ALSC' VI_TRI_DIA_DIEM ,'' PHAN_LOAI ,T.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS GHI_CHU ,LISTAGG(L.SSLP_RACK_ROW||'-'||L.SSLP_RACK_LOCATION||'-'||L.SSLP_RACK_HEIGHT, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY L.LOCS_PHYSICAL_ISN) VI_TRI FROM LAGI T ,KUND K ,LCNV_LOCATIONS_VIEW L WHERE T.LAGI_CUSTOMER_NO_AIRLINE = K.KUND_CUSTOMER_NO_ AND L.IDENT_NO = T.LAGI_IDENT_NO AND L.LOCS_DELETED = 0 AND T.LAGI_DELETED = 0 AND K.KUND_RECORD_DELETED = 0 /*AND (T.LAGI_DATE_LATEST_PKG_DEL IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_DATE_LATEST_PKG_DEL) = ' ')*/ AND T.Lagi_Date_First_Pkg_Rec <= trunc(sysdate) - {0} --AND T.LAGI_MAWB_NO = '23314362' GROUP BY T.LAGI_MAWB_PREFIX || TO_CHAR(T.LAGI_MAWB_NO ,'00000000') ,T.LAGI_HAWB ,K.KUND_3_LETTER_CODE || ' ' || T.LAGI_FLIGHT_NO_IN ,GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0) ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_EXPECTED ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_EXPECTED ,T.LAGI_QUANTITY_RECEIVED ,T.LAGI_WEIGHT_RECEIVED ,T.LAGI_SHIPMENT_REMARKS ,T.LAGI_GOODS_CONTENT ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Name ,T.Lagi_Consignee_Name ,T.Lagi_Shipper_Address ,t.lagi_consignee_address ORDER BY GET_DATETIME(T.LAGI_FLIGHT_DATE_IN ,0) desc

HERMES28.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, t.*, k.time_message_sent, round((to_date(k.time_message_sent,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS')-to_date(t.time_confirmed,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60,2) as time_used from ( SELECT distinct labs.labs_ident_no as LAS_INDENT, flup.FLUP_FLIGHT_NO_LVG||flup.flup_flight_no AS FLIGHT_NO , to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_actual_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DEPARTURE_DATE, flup.FLUP_ACTUAL_TIME AS DEPARTURE_TIME , labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX||labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO AS AWB_NO, to_char(a.agen_creation_datetime,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as time_confirmed FROM FLUP flup JOIN CONT cont ON cont.CONT_FLIGHT_NO_ = flup.flup_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + cont.CONT_DATE = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_scheduled_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = cont.cont_uld_isn JOIN LABS labs on awbu.awbu_mawb_ident_no = labs.LABS_IDENT_NO join agen a on labs.labs_ident_no = a.agen_ident_no and a.agen_status_external = 'AWB CONFIRMED' --and a.agen_type='EXPORT' and a.agen_remarks = 'AWB was confirmed at ...' WHERE 1 = 1 AND to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.FLUP_ACTUAL_DATE between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 ) t left join ( SELECT distinct labs.labs_ident_no as LAS_INDENT, flup.FLUP_FLIGHT_NO_LVG||flup.flup_flight_no AS FLIGHT_NO , to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_actual_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DEPARTURE_DATE, flup.FLUP_ACTUAL_TIME AS DEPARTURE_TIME , labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX||labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO AS AWB_NO, to_char(a.agen_creation_datetime,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as time_message_sent FROM FLUP flup JOIN CONT cont ON cont.CONT_FLIGHT_NO_ = flup.flup_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + cont.CONT_DATE = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_scheduled_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = cont.cont_uld_isn JOIN LABS labs on awbu.awbu_mawb_ident_no = labs.LABS_IDENT_NO left join agen a on labs.labs_ident_no = a.agen_ident_no and a.agen_status_external = 'MESSAGE SENT' --and a.agen_type='EXPORT' and a.agen_remarks = 'C2K:RCS Message has been sent Succesfully' WHERE 1 = 1 AND to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.FLUP_ACTUAL_DATE between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 ) k on t.LAS_INDENT=k.LAS_INDENT ORDER BY t.DEPARTURE_DATE, t.DEPARTURE_TIME, t.FLIGHT_NO, t.AWB_NO ASC)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

HERMES01_1.SQL: SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY AGEN_CREATION_DATETIME) as STT , AIRLINE , PREFIX , to_char(MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000') as MAWB_SERIAL_NO , ORIGIN , DESTINATION , BOOKED_QUANTITY , RECEIVED_QUANTITY , BOOKED_WEIGHT , RECEIVED_WEIGHT , DELIVERED_VOLUME , AGENT_NAME , to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + CONFIRMED_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as CONFIRMED_DATE , CONFIRMED_TIME , AGEN_CREATION_DATETIME , RCS_STATUS , to_char(RCS_SENT_DATETIME, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as RCS_SENT_DATETIME FROM REPORT.EXP_DAILY_AWB WHERE AGEN_CREATION_DATETIME between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND AIRLINE not like 'JL' AND AIRLINE like '{1}' AND (PREFIX || trim(to_char(MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000'))) = {2} ORDER BY AGEN_CREATION_DATETIME ASC

HERMES03.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, labs.labs_ident_no as LAS_INDENT, labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET as RECEIVED_DATE, labs.LABS_TIME_STATUS_4_SET as RECEIVED_TIME, labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX as AWP, labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO AS SERIAL_NO, labs.LABS_DESTINATION as DEST, labs.LABS_SHIPPER_NAME as SHIPPER_NAME, labs.LABS_SHIPPER as CUS_CODE, labs.LABS_CONSIGNEE_NAME as CONSIGNEE_NAME, labs.LABS_AGENT_NAME as CNEE, labs.labs_quantity_del as RECEIVED_PIECES, labs.labs_weight_del as RECEIVED_WEIGHT, sum(awbu.awbu_pieces) as DEPARTED_PIECES, sum(awbu.awbu_weight) as DEPARTED_WEIGHT, labs.labs_quantity_del - sum(nvl(awbu.awbu_pieces,0)) as INVENTORY_PIECES, labs.labs_weight_del - sum(nvl(awbu.awbu_weight,0)) as INVENTORY_WEIGHT, labs.LABS_CONTENT as NATURE, labs.LABS_SPECIAL_GOODS as SHC FROM labs labs left join awbu_awbperuld_list awbu on awbu.awbu_mawb_ident_no = labs.labs_ident_no and awbu.awbu_object_type = 'EXPORT AWB' WHERE labs.labs_deleted = 0 and labs.labs_returntoagent=0 AND labs.LABS_LIVE_UNTIL >= sysdate GROUP BY labs.labs_ident_no, labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET, labs.LABS_TIME_STATUS_4_SET, labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX, labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO, labs.LABS_DESTINATION, labs.LABS_SHIPPER_NAME, labs.LABS_SHIPPER, labs.LABS_CONSIGNEE_NAME, labs.LABS_AGENT_NAME, labs.labs_quantity_del, labs.labs_weight_del, labs.labs_quantity_manif, labs.labs_weight_manif, labs.LABS_CONTENT, labs.LABS_SPECIAL_GOODS, rownum ORDER BY RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVED_TIME ASC)P_RESULT where rankid> ({0}-1) * {1} and rankid<=((({0}-1) * {1} ) + {1})
